title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration: use Ollama models as LLM, chat, or embedding backends in LangChain apps.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; manage models & chats in any modern browser.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent builder API, async & reactive wrappers.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate: strongly-typed client with tokio & streaming support.

title: ollama-copilots
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-chat-mac
summary: Native SwiftUI chat app for macOS; drag-and-drop model files, menu-bar quick prompt.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches & serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines (GitHub Actions, GitLab, etc.).

title: ollama-embeddings
summary: Official examples and utilities for generating embeddings with Ollama’s nomic-embed & mxbai models.

title: ollama-cli-tools
summary: Bash/Zsh plugin that adds autocompletion, fzf model picker, and prompt history to the ollama CLI.

title: ollama-gui-tools
summary: Cross-platform Flutter desktop app for browsing, downloading, and benchmarking Ollama models.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local LLM chats to any server with slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration: use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit template for building shareable Ollama-powered chat apps in pure Python.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official NPM package providing JavaScript/TypeScript bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package: lightweight Python client for chatting, embedding, and model management.

title: r/ollama - Local LLMs ecosystem discussion
summary: Active subreddit for sharing tools, benchmarks, and troubleshooting Ollama integrations.
